title: StealthsNet
author: StealthsNet
content: Hi Bitcointalk community. Our website has launched 3 months ago with an exclusive service, no-kyc virtual cards. It was a successful launch but we needed to disable automated card services after first month due to issues related with card issuer.After some break, we are happy to announce that we have completed integration of automated prepaid cards. You can buy a prepaid card and receive details right after payment confirmation on the blockchain. By the way, we have 3D prepaid card option this time, perfect choice for European users. ‚≠ê VISA International Prepaid Card (3D secure, Google Pay, Apple Pay)üí≥ MasterCard EU/US Prepaid Card (Google Pay, Apple Pay)üá∫üá∏ VISA Gift Card (US only)Maximum card limits is $500/‚Ç¨500 at the moment, we are working on it and it'll be increased to $1000 this week.Also, if you need an anonymous virtual phone number, you may check our virtual number service too:üì≤ Virtual Phone Number (valid for 1 year) Accepted cryptocurrencies: Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash, Ethereum, BNB, Litecoin, Tron, USDT (TRC-20 & BEP-20) and MoneroStore page: https://stealths.net/store

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: There is no need of making multiple Announcement threads. I just saw an older thread of your service, which I think had some good engagement in it. The forum rules do not allow this unless if you plan to lock the other thread.

comments.author: StealthsNet
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on November 26, 2023, 10:47:35 PMThere is no need of making multiple Announcement threads. I just saw an older thread of your service, which I think had some good engagement in it. The forum rules do not allow this unless if you plan to lock the other thread.Hi, you are right it's better to keep on a single thread. I will lock this one and keep conversation on the other thread. Thank you for the warning.
